attributes.title: Instructions Unclear; Got COVID-19
attributes.review: This app told me to go out in public and not wear a mask. 2 days later I tested positive for COVID-19 and spread it to my whole family. This app is responsible for my grandmother’s passing.

attributes.title: Smelly app :/
attributes.review: Slam... poetry. YELLING! Angry???? WAVING MY HANDS A LOT! Specific point of view on things! Cynthia! Cyn-thi-a! Jesus died for our sin-thi-as! Jesus cried, runaway bride. Julia Roberts! Julia Rob-hurts????! Cynthia! Mmmmmmmm, Cynthia. You're dead. You are dead, bop boop beep bop bop boop bop. You're dead. That's for Cynthia... who's dead.

attributes.title: Terrible app
